ai_questions.topicName_real: something that surprised you and made you happy
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an unexpected joyful experience you had
points_original: What the surprise was
How you found out about the surprise
What you did after you found out
And explain why the surprise made you happy
points_rewrite: Describe the nature of this pleasant surprise
Explain how you discovered this surprise
Share why this brought you happiness

ai_questions.topicName_real: an occasion when you lost something in a public place
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a time you misplaced belongings in public
points_original: What you lost
When and where you lost this thing
What you did to try and find it
And explain how you felt about it
points_rewrite: Specify the time and location of the incident
Express your emotional response to the situation

ai_questions.topicName_real: a change you made in your daily life that saved you a lot of time
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a time-saving adjustment to your routine
points_original: What the change was
When you made this change

And explain how making this change in your daily life saved you a lot of time
points_rewrite: Assess the difficulty level of implementation
Explain the time efficiency benefits you gained

ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a beneficial innovation that transformed society
points_original: What this invention is

ai_questions.topicName_real: an occasion when someone said something positive about some work that you did

points_original: Who it was
What kind of work you did
